bool ProcessSubstitutionTag (const QString &tag, QString &result) const

Detailed Description

Copy of text files with some tags substitution and optional license attachment.

Tags parameter must be separated using : character. Tags (inclusive parameter) must be enclosed in $ character, for example $AcfCompanyName$ or

AcfVersion:

. Known tasks:

  • AcfCompanyName - gets name of company
  • AcfProductName - gets name of product
  • AcfApplicationName - gets name of application
  • AcfApplicationSubname - gets sub-name of product
  • AcfApplicationType - gets type information text
  • AcfLegalCopyright - gets legal copyright information text
  • AcfVersion - gets version of application, or its module, if parameter with module ID is specified
  • AcfRawVersion - gets internal version number of application, or its module, if parameter with module ID is specified
  • AcfRcVersion - gets version number (in RC compiler compatible format) of application, or its module, if parameter with module ID is specified
  • AcfTimestamp - gets current time
